CUBEX Item Types

Review what item types can be processed into myCubex cloud.

Medication

Cubex inventory devices offer high-capacity storage and security for critical medications, with automated logging of controlled substance transactions for state and federally mandated reporting. A few examples of scheduled medications stored within the devices are: opioids, narcotics, benzodiazepine tranquilizers etc. To learn more about each medication attribute, please select See more details.

Supply

Cubex inventory devices can also store and manage low security supply items to help practices avoid overstock and increase their ROI's. A few examples of scheduled medications stored within the devices are: syringes, IV tubes, gloves etc. To learn more about each supply attribute, please select See more details.
